meanings.definition: Placing too much emphasis on minor details; fussy or finicky.
meanings.sent1: She is very pernickety about the color of her pens.
meanings.sent2: The pernickety cat refused to eat anything but a specific brand of food.
meanings.sent3: The pernickety chef insisted on using only organic, locally sourced ingredients.
meanings.sent4: Her pernickety nature made her the perfect candidate for the job of quality control.
meanings.sent5: The pernickety old man meticulously arranged his book collection by genre and author.

meanings.definition: Someone who is overly concerned with trivial details.
meanings.sent1: The pernickety in the office always pointed out spelling mistakes.
meanings.sent2: Being a pernickety can be exhausting when planning events.
meanings.sent3: The pernickety at the party insisted on rearranging the furniture for better feng shui.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the pernickety of the group due to her obsession with etiquette.
meanings.sent5: The pernickety's attention to detail saved the team from a costly mistake.
